title: Instructional Design for Language Learning Pedagogy Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English sentence structures and sequence adverbs (order words)
context.additional_context: A microlearning module utilizing digital devices, where generative AI-based pedagogical agents support learning activities. Students can perform personalized feedback and interactive exercises in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately construct English sentences using sequential adverbs (e.g., First, Next, Then, Finally) by interacting with a generative AI agent.
Learners can generate short stories with logical sequential structures based on feedback from an AI agent.
Learners can improve the efficiency of language structure practice by over 30% using AI-generated content on mobile platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
